price: "Ku mayar da su a gare ni." Sai ya shiga yankansu* da takõbi ga ƙwabrukansu da wuyõyinsu.
arabic: رُدُّوهَا عَلَيَّۖ فَطَفِقَ مَسۡحَۢا بِٱلسُّوقِ وَٱلۡأَعۡنَاقِ
footnotes: * Sulaimãna ya yanka dawãkin,dõmin kallonsu yã hana shi salla, wadda take farlu ainin ce a gare shi, amma tattalin kãyan yãƙi farlu kifãya ce. Anã gabãtar da farlu ainin a kan farlu kifãya. Wannan kuma ya nũna cewa anã cin dõki idan wani dalĩli bai hana ba. Dũbi Sũra ta 16, ãyã ta 8.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: ruddūhā ʿalayya faṭafiqa masḥan bil-sūqi wal-aʿnāqi
